title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2550.2 - Applicability and effective date
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2550.2 - Applicability and effective date

State Regulations
(a) With respect to actions directly undertaken by the Division of Housing and

Community Renewal, the requirement of an environmental review pursuant to
article 8 of the Environmental Conservation Law shall take effect on the first
day of September, 1976. (b) With
respect to funding actions undertaken by the Division of Housing and Community

Renewal, the requirement of an environmental review pursuant to article 8 of
the Environmental Conservation Law shall take effect on the first day of June, 1977. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2550.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
